arts.ttl: Middlesbrough 1-0 Sheffield United: Boro have last “Lath” as Blades lose consecutive games
arts.sum: Sheffield United suffered back-to-back defeats on their travels after Middlesbrough held onto a 1-0 win on Wednesday evening. arts.ttl: Middlesbrough boss Michael Carrick offers Emmanuel Latte Lath verdict after Sheffield United win
arts.sum: It took Emmanuel Latte Lath just three minutes to prove his point to Boro boss Michael Carrick after grabbing a late winner against Sheffield United. "To be totally honest, we've got really good players throughout the squad and there's going to be times when players are in or they don't start the game.

arts.ttl: Super-sub Latte Lath seals narrow Middlesbrough win against Sheff Utd
arts.sum: Emmanuel Latte Lath's late header ensured Middlesbrough returned to winning ways with a 1-0 victory over Sheffield United in the Sky Bet Championship.
Highlights of the Sky Bet Championship clash between Middlesbrough and Sheffield United.

arts.ttl: Boro ratings vs Sheffield United as Ben Doak impresses but one man struggles
arts.sum: Emmanuel Latte Lath produced a moment of quality from the bench, scoring just his second goal of the season, but there was another Boro spark who will take the plaudits. Produced a goal saving clearance to deny Jesurun Rak-Sakyi before the half hour mark which sparked Boro into life.

arts.ttl: Super-sub Emmanuel Latte Lath snatches Middlesbrough victory
arts.sum: Latte Lath came off the bench to score an 80th-minute header.

arts.ttl: Middlesbrough predicted line-up for Sheffield United with three changes on the cards
arts.sum: The 28-year-old has not featured since the 1-0 defeat to North East rivals Sunderland back in September, but returned to the bench against Watford and Bristol City and could come back into the starting XI tonight. Michael Carrick is not a man to panic and make wholesale changes to his side, despite Middlesbrough's disappointing 2-0 defeat to Bristol City on Saturday.
